title: This assignment tests you on how to use if else statements when you want to make decisions in the program.

questionText.text:
Write a java program to find whether the given year is Leap Year or not
isLeapYear(2016) → true
isLeapYear(2019) → false
isLeapYear(2000) → true
isLeapYear(2100) → false
in1020(8, 99) → false
Check your program against test cases below as a zip file. Submit your solution(zip file) when all test cases are passed
